Text: Horrid game, but fun for a Star Wars fan.  If you like Star Wars, pick this up.  If you're looking for a serious chess program, don't get this.  The capture animations are pretty funny though!
he's right, the graphic ARE OLD,.. but the "battles" are kinda cool.  A fun game for my 8 year old Jedi "paedewan" (however it is spelled)
